md:
giải nghĩa từ "indicate" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

* Indicate (verb) - chỉ ra, chỉ định, chỉ thị
	+ Meaning: to show or point out something, often in a subtle or indirect way.
	+ Example: The doctor's expression indicated that the patient's condition was serious.
	+ Related words: suggest, imply, hint, signal
	+ Synonyms: show, point out, demonstrate, reveal

* Indicate (noun) - chỉ số, dấu hiệu
	+ Meaning: a sign or signal that something is happening or is true.
	+ Example: The rising temperature was an indication that the machine was overheating.
	+ Related words: sign, signal, symptom, clue
	+ Synonyms: evidence, proof, hint, suggestion

Note: The verb "indicate" can also be used in the context of giving directions or instructions, as in "The sign indicated the direction to the city center."
html:
giải nghĩa từ "indicate" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan và các từ đồng nghĩa.

  • Indicate (verb) - chỉ ra, chỉ định, chỉ thị

    • Meaning: to show or point out something, often in a subtle or indirect way.
    • Example: The doctor's expression indicated that the patient's condition was serious.
    • Related words: suggest, imply, hint, signal
    • Synonyms: show, point out, demonstrate, reveal

  • Indicate (noun) - chỉ số, dấu hiệu

    • Meaning: a sign or signal that something is happening or is true.
    • Example: The rising temperature was an indication that the machine was overheating.
    • Related words: sign, signal, symptom, clue
    • Synonyms: evidence, proof, hint, suggestion

Note: The verb "indicate" can also be used in the context of giving directions or instructions, as in "The sign indicated the direction to the city center."
